Lock.description: Prevents a robbery attempt. This item will still be used even if the robber would've paid you

Lock Pick.description: 75% to pick a lock. In the case that you picked the lock, you do not lose the lock pick

Precognition.description: Allows you to see the future! For the next crash game, you will automatically cash out just before the game crashes.

Donation.description: Donate money to help the poor.

Account Viewer.description: Allows you to use the account and graphbalance commands on other players!

Popularity.description: The chance of the next beg succeeding increases from 67% to 80%.

Unity Increase.description:
The maximum unity obtainable increases from 200 to 300.
This item expires every reset.

Starter Crate.description:
Directly purchase a certain amount of Credits and Unity.
Limited to 1 time per season (reset)

New Identity.description:
Instantly gain `300 Unity` and some Credits, allowing you to recover from negative Unity.
Can only be bought once per season.

Credit Doubler.description: Gain a bonus `+100% Credit Earnings Perk`.

Credit Booster.description: Gain a bonus `+15% Credit Earnings Perk`.

Mini Credit Booster.description: Gain a bonus `+5% Credit Earnings Perk`.

Gem Minerals.description:
Every season (reset), you can buy `Gems` up to a certain amount of times.
Gain bonus Gems by being top 5 in the score leaderboard.
